name: 4x4 Offroad Adventure: Real Safari Experience
description:
This is a new advance challenge for the extreme sports drivers to test their driving skills with these customized Gigantic Monsters Trucks on extreme dangerous mountain tracks. The extreme sports adventure has just become more difficult and challenging with the extreme 4x4 Offroad Adventure: Real safari experience race. The monsters trucks are not easy to handle and drive and specially on the life threatening and deadly hilly tracks.
In 4x4 Offroad Adventure: Real safari experience you will need to complete the tracks with best time to earn the points and advance further in this crazy drag racing tournament. You will have multiple advance customized monster 4x4 trucks with turbo, nitro engines to challenge your opponents in these dangerous mountainous terrains where no faint hearted drive ever willing to take the challenge.
This is a unique extreme sports madness rally with monster trucks flying through the mountains, splash through water falls, narrow destructive bridges, deadly corners and huge 4x4 Trucks and Jeeps. So download 4x4 Offroad Adventure: Real safari experience and challenge the impossible to become the extreme monster truck living legend in stunt race industry!
Features:
1) Outstanding 3D graphic
2) Easy Controls
3) Addictive Challenging Levels
4) Variety of Monster Trucks
